lenders.name: Loquita G
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of the people.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because:
I make loans because I feel a call to duty as well as an allegiance to other women of the world who need a hand up, just as others did for me as they helped mold my own early life. 

Giving another woman a hand up is the single most indulgent privilege I can think of, and I can attest that through my own giving, in return, I receive a personal joyfulness that is far more valuable than any form of currency or Prada Handbag can ever hope to match. 

We must all do what we can to make a affirmative contribution in the world. I hope you will take me up on that challenge and do something that will truly make a significant difference. Instead of a handout, try making a loan that will give another deserving woman a genuine hand up!

Sincerely, Carol

My families goal is to be entirely self sufficient by producing food and energy, reducing waste and setting a good example for our global community of free individuals.

lenders.name: Roger
lenders.occupational_info:
Born in a Barn Studio is a long established business offering 1st class recordings on a Pro Tools HD rig to clients 
throughout the local area and across the UK. The company, which is based in Ansty (just north of Coventry), originally 
started in 2004 but the owner has over 15 years experience in the music industry generally and has worked on the road 
with many top names in the past. Catering for bands, ensembles, soloists the studio is very diverse in its nature and 
boasts the largest live room in the midlands. With overnight accommodation this studio is the ideal hideaway for music 
creativity. 
Born in a Barn Studio is owned by Roger Greasby and has a growing team of freelance engineers. Roger was qualified to 
degree level in 1992 and passed a diploma in music at age 17. However the best experience any producer can gain is hands-on, 
veryday troubleshooting and final mastering experience. Born in a Barn Studio has an expanding customer base, located in 
and around Coventry, including many local bands and acoustic groups. A growing corporate side to the business now is evident 
and it undertakes larger projects if required. Clients include Birmingham StageSchool, The West Midlands Police Brass Band 
and countless bands / groups such as The Rrrs(Warwick Uni), Half of Nothing(Coventry), Ist(Leicester), Dear Superstar(Manchester), 
The Void(Coventry), Vigilante Wing(Chesterfield), Temba(London) to name a few. The firm offers comprehensive recording services 
to bands / groups / agents and businesses, which are designed to be cost effective for everyone. With a custom built studio 
(in old milking parlour style premises on 1 level), the business is ideal for a diverse range of situations and also has 
experienced staff allowing clients to fully relax into their music. A full mastering service is offered to new clients and 
duplication services are available through good local contacts. Any bands wanting to record over the weekend also have the option of getting 
a gig in Coventry with local venues.

lenders.loan_because: I want to help people be successful in their businesses and lives.  Some people are not as fortunate as we are and they just need a helping hand.  Even though we're kids, we can still help!
lenders.occupational_info: In Service Learning we do all sorts of projects to help others such as recycling, educating others about proper care for animals, collecting and donating cell phones, caring for our groundwater, donating to PlayPumps in Africa, and cleaning up our own little town.  We have done fundraisers for many organizations over the years and we hope this donation to Kiva will pass through many entrepreneurs' hands.

lenders.loan_because: I'm lucky to have been born into circumstances and an environment in which I was highly favored to succeed. I believe that Kiva allows me to help level the playing field and provide an advantage to those who desire more than what their circumstances may have otherwise offered.

lenders.name: Lara

lenders.name: Trinidad
lenders.occupation: Manufacture, sale and distribution of wooden palle
lenders.loan_because: In our country, unfortunately we do not have opportunities, people especially the elderly to access a loan because they think that we are no longer useful to society. With my children we have created a small company so our job is to make pallets for the export of various products of our country. But we do not have enough money to buy the wood out of our city, Guayaquil, as if it would be so much more convenient and our business may be a little more and could help others to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: Our job is to make processed wood (including pallets of bananas for export). If we had the opportunity to buy infrastructure, surely we could get some places to sell our product in different banana exporters that are in our country.

lenders.name: Ida
lenders.loan_because: I know how difficult it can be to start and maintain a business

lenders.name: Amara E.
lenders.loan_because: our humanity is revealed through charity for those we may never save; our depravity through our willingness to give up on them so easily...

lenders.loan_because: While living in Russia, the people who loved and helped me had much less than I did.  I want to share the same love the Russians showed me to those who can use my help.

I am a student at the University of Utah, studying Computer Science with an emphasis in Engineering Arts and Entertainment (Video games and movies)

I also work for the University of Utah with a grant from the National Science Foundation teaching highschool kids about Engineering and Computer Science.

lenders.name: Mikesh
lenders.loan_because: Micro lending can directly impact the quality of life for individuals and their families. If I can help change the life of someone else by spending some of my money less frivolously, and loaning it to someone else, I would gladly do it.
lenders.occupational_info: I ensure the technology and operations systems work correctly for a marketing firm.

lenders.name: John

lenders.name: 1A Verbraucherportal
lenders.occupational_info:
Germany’s consumer portal about health, prevention and  insurance "1A Verbraucherportal" provides visitors with the latest health and insurance market news, insurance tests, price comparison and address lists of the insurance companies. The website also contains additional information on health topics, such as useful guidelines, how-to checklists and best deals. A complete list of German insurance companies is available on the site. The consumer portal “1A Verbraucherportal” is one of the most popular German websites of its kind with some 3 million visitors each year. 

--

Deutschlands 1A Verbraucherportal informiert aktuell über Gesundheit, Vorsorge und Versicherung. Neben täglichen Nachrichten zum Gesundheitswesen werden Ratgeber, Krankenkassen Adressen, Testberichte zu Versicherungen, Preisvergleiche und Checklisten angeboten. Das Portal veröffentlicht zudem eine regelmäßig aktualisierte Liste aller Krankenversicherungen in Deutschland. Das 1A Verbraucherportal ist mit rund 3 Millionen Besuchern pro Jahr eines der reichweitenstärksten Angebote dieser Art in Deutschland.

lenders.name: Xpats Bar & The Kitchen
lenders.loan_because: We like to support fellow small business entrepreneurs around the globe as we know how hard it can be to succeed in business.
lenders.occupational_info: Xpats Bar is Shenzhen's premier expatriate bar.   The Kitchen is the #1 restaurant in Shenzhen, China.

lenders.name: Keith
lenders.loan_because: I am of American Indian ancestry and an Eagle scout.  Growing up I was taught the, "give away" ceremony was a way to give back to the community to help everyone.  This is a way for me to give back to others in need and to keep the giving going.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a registered Nurse which sounds funny to others in different parts of the world since males do not usually go into nursing.  I help care for cancer patients in all aspects that I can.
